Articles.Content:
Testing my lander. They really are tough little guys.

The definition of insanity, etc etc

Good thing your lander is tough, did the Kerbal pooped his pants?

Also, welcome to the forums!
Even if you're sure they're dead they always find their way back to the space center. Amazing creatures!

Even if you're sure they're dead they always find their way back to the space center.

Is that why they're green? Because they're zombies?

it is because they are plant-based lifeforms that create food in sunlight for themselves (although they still eat snacks) as to how they keep coming back, i think it is due to a seed vault that exists under the astronaut complex where they grow kerbals after their death
